footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its sacred origins, and how it can facilitate deep healing.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your journey with wisdom and compassion.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. Discover our tips.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, special events, and inspiring content.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start healing.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you selected 'Yes'.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred brew used for centuries by indigenous tribes of the Amazon. It is a powerful healing tool that cleanses the body, mind, and spirit, opening the doors to deep introspection and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine acts as a mirror to the soul, revealing subconscious patterns, repressed traumas, and emotional blockages. Through visions and deep catharsis, it helps you release what no longer serves you and reconnect with your true essence.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a teacher that instructs, guides, and protects. Each ceremony is an intimate dialogue with this ancestral wisdom, offering unique and personalized lessons for your life path.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and purpose. Many find answers to questions that have been with them for years.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas and stuck emotions in a safe and supportive environment. Ayahuasca allows you to process and heal deep wounds from the past.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a sense of unity with nature, the universe, and your own being. Strengthen your intuition and spiritual connection.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a circle of trust. The strength of the group amplifies the experience, creating a powerful field of support and transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs. Ideal for those seeking a deep and focused immersion.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is composed of dedicated and compassionate spiritual guides with years of experience in handling ancestral medicines. Their mission is to hold a sacred, safe, and deeply respectful space for your transformation.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our ceremonies, past and future. Each one is a unique opportunity for healing and growth.
processSectionSubtitle: Each stage is fundamental to your path of transformation.
preparationProcessDescription: Physical and mental preparation before the ceremony is crucial to opening yourself up to the experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where you surrender to the medicine under the guidance and protection of our facilitators.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey into your inner self, where you confront, release, and heal.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of incorporating the teachings of the ceremony into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: The diet is an essential part of the preparation. Cleanse your body to receive the medicine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Open your mind and heart to receive the blessings of the ceremony.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and increase your receptivity.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal or understand? Define clear intentions to guide your journey.
reflectionDescription: Take time to journal your thoughts and emotions before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. The key is to surrender, trust, and allow the medicine to guide you through the healing process. Our team is here to support you every step of the way.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
allowedFoodsList: Whole grains like brown rice and quinoa
essentialsList: Respect for the process and others
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content, users, and settings.
themeTabDescription: Modify the application's colors in real-time. Changes will be applied upon saving.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review user conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Here you can view all user interactions.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage registered users in the application.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to complete The Art of Healing questionnaire to prepare for your ceremony. You can access it here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to ensure a safe experience.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their answers yet.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your answers have been saved. You can review them here.
questionnaireDescription: Your answers help us ensure a safe and enriching experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (depression, anxiety, psychosis, etc.)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had any previous experience with Ayahuasca or other medicinal plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what are you looking to heal/explore with this experience?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm seeking clarity on my life's purpose, healing a past wound, connecting with my spirituality...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed a very important step. We now invite you to review our preparation guide to ensure your experience is as deep and healing as possible.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to reserve your spot in our ceremonies and access exclusive preparation content.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I'm here to help answer your questions about the medicine and the healing process. How can I help you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Please try again later.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must upload a file or provide a URL.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The guide will be permanently deleted.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The event has been moved to past events.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The ceremony will be permanently deleted.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the past events section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will not be visible to users. You can reactivate it later.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Follow us on our social media to stay tuned.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the background video of the main section.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
